channel.title: OSPF Lab - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Welcome to the CCNA OSPF lab. Youâ€™ll need to configure OSPF so that there are full routing capabilities in the network. As well as use show commands to verify your network. Then you will troubleshoot and fix a broken OSPF network. Once again, this will all be done in Packet Tracer. But feel free to do this lab on real equipment, GNS-3, etc. OSPF Setup There are two main ways to configure OSPF.
